name: unskilful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not good at doing something, or lacking skills generally: Unfortunately, they made a couple of unskilful moves that played directly into the hands of their opponents. The drivers are adventurous and even aggressive, but not unskilful.
More examplesFewer examplesThis dish reveals the widest possible difference between the work of a skilful and unskilful cook.Many of the immigrants were unskilful workers in search of a better life.His unskilful management of the expedition did nothing to lower his popularity.
